Ok....but you will have to wait till grounded gets back


thecode@... wrote:

> OOC: I know, but Arrow wants to be able to open the shields whenever HE
> wants to...
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Jordan Guthrie" <gunthers8@...>
> To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 1:03 AM
> Subject: Re: Dark returns...
> 
> 
>  > OOC: Grounded already opened the shields for Arrow.
>  >
>  > ::Grounded::
>  > Grounded headed in a straight line for the bombs and he was almost there.
>  >
>  > thecode@... wrote:
>  >
>  > > Stranato heard the sounds going away. He sighed and continued through
> the
>  > > tunnel, heading back towards the entrance to his hole...
>  > >
>  > > ----- Original Message -----
>  > > From: "Jordan Guthrie" <gunthers8@...>
>  > > To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
>  > > Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 12:44 AM
>  > > Subject: Re: Dark returns...
>  > >
>  > >
>  > >  > ::Grounded::
>  > >  > "What, bombs..." he questioned. Yes, he could feel them now.  He
> looked
>  > >  > back. He began going for the bombs.
>  > >  >
>  > >  > thecode@... wrote:
>  > >  >
>  > >  > > Stranato knows that that Grounded was following him through the
> tunnel,
>  > > now.
>  > >  > >
>  > >  > > Stranato: Yes I will. I'll not only get away, but activate those
> bombs
>  > > once
>  > >  > > I'm out!
>  > >  > >
>  > >  > > Stranato yelled back at Grounded...
>  > >  > >
>  > >  > > ----- Original Message -----
>  > >  > > From: "Jordan Guthrie" <gunthers8@...>
>  > >  > > To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
>  > >  > > Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 1:04 AM
>  > >  > > Subject: Re: Dark returns...
>  > >  > >
>  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > ::Grounded::
>  > >  > >  > The blind bot continues to feel the bot's vibrations as he
> moves. He
>  > >  > >  > cuts in a sharp angle into the bot's new tunnel and begins to
> follow
>  > > it.
>  > >  > >  > "you will not get away" he yells down the hole.
>  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > thecode@... wrote:
>  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > > Stranato felt the other's prescence.
>  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > > Stranato: Oh damn.
>  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > > He starts to dig in fast zigzag patterns...
>  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > > ----- Original Message -----
>  > >  > >  > > From: "Jordan Guthrie" <gunthers8@...>
>  > >  > >  > > To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
>  > >  > >  > > Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 12:57 AM
>  > >  > >  > > Subject: Re: Dark returns...
>  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >  > ::Grounded::
>  > >  > >  > >  > Grounded popped into the other bots hole.
>  > >  > >  > >  > "Hmm i can feel his vibrations, they are getting stronger,
> he
>  > >  > > must be
>  > >  > >  > >  > close."
>  > >  > >  > >  > He begins to head towards the vibrations.
>  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > thecode@... wrote:
>  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > > Arrow threw Perplex into a CR Chamber.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >  > > Arrow: That's right, find him.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >  > > Stranato hears something, like someone digging through
>  > > another
>  > >  > > tunnel.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >  > > Stranato: Damn.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >  > > He drops the bombs he was holding and starts back 
> through
> the
>  > > hole
>  > >  > >  > > again...
>  > >  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >  > > ----- Original Message -----
>  > >  > >  > >  > > From: "Jordan Guthrie" <gunthers8@...>
>  > >  > >  > >  > > To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
>  > >  > >  > >  > > Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 12:44 AM
>  > >  > >  > >  > > Subject: Re: Dark returns...
>  > >  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > ::Grounded::
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Grounded listened to all that was happening.  He 
> heard
>  > >  > > Arrow and
>  > >  > >  > > with
>  > >  > >  > > a
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > touch of some buttons on his wrist comp the shields
>  > > opened.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > "Arrow, you must listen before taking act for I can
> tell
>  > > from
>  > >  > > the
>  > >  > >  > > energy
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > in your spark what you may intend to do.  Burning
>  > > Hammer is
>  > >  > >  > > in...what
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > you call a personality conflict, of what he is, and
>  > > what he
>  > >  > > wants to
>  > >  > >  > > be.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  >   He proves to be no harm right now, so please leave
>  > > him to
>  > > be.
>  > >  > >  > > But i
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > feel the vibrations of something moving through the
>  > > ground,
>  > >  > > which is
>  > >  > >  > > my
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > territory. Nightlight please help Burning Hammer and
> the
>  > > rest.
>  > >  > > Also
>  > >  > >  > > i
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > have heard something from that Deemos that is quite
>  > > upsetting.
>  > >  > > He
>  > >  > >  > > wishes
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > to kill Trinity. Keep her out of trouble. I will 
> leave
>  > > now."
>  > >  > >  > > Grounded
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > replied and using only vibrations to tell where 
> things
>  > > were
>  > > ran
>  > >  > > and
>  > >  > >  > > dove
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > outside digging into the ground in a perfevt path to
>  > > intercept
>  > >  > >  > > Stranato.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Grounded had finally remembered all of his past, but
> he
>  > > would
>  > >  > > worry
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > about that later.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > airly2000@... wrote:
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > Nightlight::
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > "Arrow..." said with a low voice Nightlight and she
>  > > shouted
>  > >  > > "All
>  > >  > >  > > it's
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > ok, Arrow, don't worry... Zeni it's ok. He isn't
> hurt...
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" 
> <thecode@p...>
>  > > wrote:
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Burning Hammer looked at Nighlight now. WIth sad
> eyes
>  > >  > > and a
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > confused look.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Zeni came out from behind Burning Hammer and
> stepped
>  > > in
>  > >  > >  > > front of
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > him. Arrow
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > could be heard from outside.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Arrow: Open the shields! Come on, open them! 
> Open
>  > > them!!!
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Burning Hammer eyes darted to the door.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Burning hammer: Shouldn't you open the shields?
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > His eyes quickly returned to Zeni. Zeni held out
> his
>  > > hand
>  > >  > >  > > to the
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > serial
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > killer turned bounty hunter. Burning Hammer took
> his
>  > > hand.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Burning Hammer: I killed my best friend, 
> kid, I'm
> not
>  > > so
>  > >  > > great,
>  > >  > >  > > not
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > great
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > like I thought I was. I killed him because there
>  > > was a
>  > >  > >  > > bounty on
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > him. if
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > that tells how great I am.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Zeni: You can still be great.
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Arrow: Open the damn door!
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Arrow never let up, never stopped yelling until
>  > > he got
>  > >  > > what
>  > >  > > he
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > wanted...
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > ----- Original Message -----
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > From: <airly2000@y...>
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2001 12:23 AM
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > Subject: Re: Dark returns...
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > Nightlight:
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > "I'm not in position to lie... I'm telling the
> true
>  > >  > > and I
>  > >  > >  > > always
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > have
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > told it...What will we get if we lie?
> Nothing...
>  > > Lamda
>  > >  > > was
>  > >  > >  > > right
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > when
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > she said that we aren't gods to forgive 
> easyly,
>  > > Windlord
>  > >  > >  > > doubted
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > and
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > I doubted too... I don't know what think
> Windlord,
>  > > but I
>  > >  > > was
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > starting
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > to forget when you tried to destroy us..." 
> said

>  > >  > >  > > had
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > now a double reason to be worried "I... I 
> hoped
>  > > that
>  > > you

>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > wanted join us after she... her wounds cured
> and
>  > > after

>  > >  > >  > > recover
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > the memorie... She come and said something 
> like

>  > >  > > fired... "
>  > >  > >  > > I
>  > >  > >  > >  > >  > > can't

>  > > that
